channel.title: Python on M'Sync
channel.description: Recent content in Python on M'Sync

item.title: MLX
item.description: MLX 20/80. With 20% effort, hope to get 80% covered on MLX's offerings. And, I don't stand by this claim.

item.title: Notes for Deep Learning with Python
item.description: Chapter-wise notes for <a href="https://www.manning.com/books/deep-learning-with-python-second-edition">Deep Learning with Python</a> with Python and Clojure code samples. The book is not done. These notes are evolving as I get deeper both into the book and the accompanying code.
